email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, built in 2018, and fully compliant with all regulations. I can adjust the freight rate to $48.50 per ton. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 is more reasonable. However, we’d like to lock in the laycan as 15-18 October to avoid any delays. Also, can you confirm the cargo size is 140,000 MT? Looking forward to your confirmation. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed. The laycan is now 15-18 October, and the cargo size is 140,000 MT. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement with the agreed terms: $48.50 per ton, demurrage at $20,000 per day, and the MV Ocean Star. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. We’ll aim to finalize by end of day. Thanks for your help on this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve attached the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if there are any adjustments needed. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best regards, Sarah
